comment: Mrs. Williams is the BEST education professor I have had at KSU. She is so passionate about her class and always made it fun to come to class. She has no deadlines, but gives you suggested deadlines to keep up, which I recommend you do. It was nice if you have a lot of other work in other classes though. TAKE HER!!!!!!!!!
Hands down the best professor I've had! She's so friendly and takes the time to let students talk about their FX.

She was SUPER organized and graded quickly. Everything was CLEARLY laid out and easy to find and do. DEFINITELY TAKE HER!!!! There's a LOT of work but she's a GREAT professor and has everything opened for you to take advantage and do if you are busy the next week.
Great professor! Truly loves what she teaches and will help you out a lot! Gives in class time to work on assignments. Take her!
Ms. Williams is awesome! I took her online summer course for Exceptional Students. Although there was a ton of classwork, it was worth it. She taught me so much and I highly recommend taking her!

OK. Tons of group projects! And I mean tons. Lots of presentations. I felt like Mrs. Williams didn't teach all that much, because we were always doing presentations! She is super nice and extremely knowledgable about special education. I just don't feel like I learned a whole lot, but some of the material is very inspiring.

Mrs. Williams is the best teacher I have had at KSU.  She actually teaaches you whil givng you her real life expeirences.  She makes her class interesting! I love her class and if I could take her for all my education classes I would! Take her if you can!!!
Prof.Williams is one of the best professors I have ever had at KSU.  If more professors were like her, this school would be a top-rated school.  She has inspired me to teach special ed.

Ms. Willams is a very sweet teacher. She absolutely LOVES working & teaching about children with special needs.  She cries all the time, you can tell that she absolutely loves what she does and it is very heart felt.  Wish more teachers at KSU had half her passion and desire for their work.  Highly recommend MS. Williams, easy A. Great teacher!
